H0.text: About 2 km is the approximate maximum height of mid‑ocean ridges.

H1.text: About 2 meters is how tall mid‑ocean ridges can be.

H2.text: About 2 feet is the typical height of mid‑ocean ridges.

H3.text: 2 inches is about how tall mid‑ocean ridges can be.

A4.text: A mid-ocean ridge rises about 2,000 meters above the deepest portion of an ocean basin.
